metadata.title: CVE-2016-4491 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
The d_print_comp function in cp-demangle.c in libiberty allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation fault and crash) via a crafted binary, which triggers infinite recursion and a buffer overflow, related to a node having "itself as ancestor more than once."

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-4491` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabi - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabihf - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-common - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-for-build - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-for-host - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-hppa-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-hppa64-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-i686-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-i686-kfreebsd-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-i686-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-ia64-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-m68k-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-multiarch - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-powerpc-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-powerpc64-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-powerpc64le-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-riscv64-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-s390x-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-sh4-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-source - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-sparc64-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-x86-64-kfreebsd-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-x86-64-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-x86-64-linux-gnux32 - 2.29-1ubuntu1
libbinutils - 2.29-1ubuntu1
libctf-nobfd0 - 2.29-1ubuntu1
libctf0 - 2.29-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

gdb - 8.0-0ubuntu3
gdb-multiarch - 8.0-0ubuntu3
gdb-source - 8.0-0ubuntu3
gdbserver - 8.0-0ubuntu3
No subscription required

ht - 2.1.0+repack1-1
No subscription required

valgrind - 1:3.12.0-1.1ubuntu2
valgrind-mpi - 1:3.12.0-1.1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: binutils package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.29-1ubuntu1').
binutils-h8300-hms package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
gcc-h8300-hms package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
gdb package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.0-0ubuntu3').
ht package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.0+repack1-1').
nescc package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
valgrind package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.12.0-1.1ubuntu2').
